summary: reduces the red light during sunrise and sunset but only during cloudy skies or clear weather.
descriptionHtml:
this is for users that use colorful ENBÂ´s 
many ENB's have a fault, that when there is sunrise or sunset the red is overly bloom
I know, that the new ENB's no longer have that Problem, but they have bad Performance and also bad antialiasing Support
this if for users that still use the old ENB's
or for users that prefer different sunrise or sunset colors 
redlight -
it reduces redlight at all climate zones only during clear weather and cloudy weather 
to install this, you just simply have to unpack the redlight-.esp into the Skyrim data Folder
not compatible with other weather mods
if you try it and you like it - ENJOY
author: rockinbandit
